section.title: Load Balancer Definitions in Network Groups
section.para: In a cloud consisting of a single control-plane, a load-balancer may be fully defined within a network-groups object as shown in the examples above. See section for a complete description of load balancer attributes.

Starting in &kw-hos-phrase;, a load-balancer may be defined within a control-plane object in which case the network-group provides just a list of load balancer names as shown below. See section definitions in control planes.
section.screen:
network-groups:
- name: EXTERNAL-API hostname-suffix: extapi
load-balancers: - lb-cp1 - lb-cp2
section.para: The same load balancer name can be used in multiple control-planes to make the above list simpler.
